definition.content: relationship established between PIs and other identifiers in different encoding domains

notes.content: While the identifiers of these features or objects can sometimes identify a place, within the scope of this document, the identifiers of features or objects existing in other encoding domains are referred to conceptually as "other identifiers".
These "other identifiers" can exist outside of the PI architecture.

Estos "otros identificadores" pueden existir fuera de la arquitectura PI
